Subject: ARCReader API
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=215482878

Hello!
  Now I'm trying to read the crawled html files using the API provided
by heritrix. While reading gzipped ARC files, I alwas get an error message
"Failed to find GZIP MAGIC". Do you have any ideas, how to fix this bug?
The heritrix I use has is built on source version 1.2.0.
  If I try to read unzipped ARCs using the next() method of ARCReader,
I always get the whole file as one record: The first record's metadata is
the datablock starts like this "filedesc://" and I cannot get records any
more. How can I use this API properly?
Tamas
